name: NSPrintInfo
desc: An object that stores information that’s used to generate printed output.

items.name: class var shared: NSPrintInfo
items.desc: The shared printing information object.

items.name: init(dictionary: [NSPrintInfo.AttributeKey : Any])
items.desc: Returns a printing information object initialized with the parameters in the specified dictionary.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a printing information object.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a printing information object from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var paperSize: NSSize
items.desc: The size of the paper.

items.name: var topMargin: CGFloat
items.desc: The top margin to the specified size.

items.name: var bottomMargin: CGFloat
items.desc: The height of the bottom margin.

items.name: var leftMargin: CGFloat
items.desc: The width of the left margin.

items.name: var rightMargin: CGFloat
items.desc: The width of the right margin.

items.name: var imageablePageBounds: NSRect
items.desc: The imageable area of a sheet of paper specified by the print info.

items.name: var orientation: NSPrintInfo.PaperOrientation
items.desc: The orientation attribute.

items.name: enum NSPrintInfo.PaperOrientation
items.desc: Constants that describe the orientation of printing on a page.

items.name: var paperName: NSPrinter.PaperName?
items.desc: The name of the currently selected paper size.

items.name: struct NSPrinter.PaperName
items.desc: The type you use to specify the name of a type of paper.

items.name: var localizedPaperName: String?
items.desc: The human-readable name of the currently selected paper size, suitable for presentation in user interfaces.

items.name: var horizontalPagination: NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode
items.desc: The horizontal pagination mode.

items.name: var verticalPagination: NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode
items.desc: The vertical pagination to the specified mode.

items.name: enum NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode
items.desc: Constants that specify the different ways in which an image is divided into pages.

items.name: var isHorizontallyCentered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is centered horizontally.

items.name: var isVerticallyCentered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is centered vertically.

items.name: var printer: NSPrinter
items.desc: The printer object to be used for printing.

items.name: class NSPrinter
items.desc: An object that describes a printer’s capabilities.

items.name: var jobDisposition: NSPrintInfo.JobDisposition
items.desc: The action specified for the job.

items.name: struct NSPrintInfo.JobDisposition
items.desc: Constants that specify values for the print job disposition.

items.name: func setUpPrintOperationDefaultValues()
items.desc: Validates the attributes encapsulated by the print info.

items.name: func dictionary() -> NSMutableDictionary
items.desc: Returns the print info’s dictionary that contains the printing attributes.

items.name: var isSelectionOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether only the currently selected contents should be printed.

items.name: var scalingFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The current scaling factor.

items.name: var printSettings: NSMutableDictionary
items.desc: A mutable dictionary containing the print settings from Core Printing.

items.name: typealias NSPrintInfo.SettingKey
items.desc: The type you use to specify a print info setting key.

items.name: func pmPrintSession() -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: Returns a Core Printing object configured with the print info’s session information.

items.name: func pmPageFormat() -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: Returns a Core Printing object configured with the print info’s page format information.

items.name: func pmPrintSettings() -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: Returns a Core Printing object configured with the print info’s print settings information

items.name: func updateFromPMPageFormat()
items.desc: Synchronizes the print info’s page format information with information from its associated page format object.

items.name: func updateFromPMPrintSettings()
items.desc: Synchronizes the print info’s print settings information with information from its associated print settings object.

items.name: func takeSettings(from: NSPDFInfo)
items.desc: Updates the print info with all the settings and attributes in the specified PDF info object.

items.name: struct NSPrintInfo.AttributeKey
items.desc: Constants that specify print job attributes.

items.name: class var defaultPrinter: NSPrinter?
items.desc: Deprecated.
